Text: FW thank youForwarded by Karen OwensHOUEES on AM Heath Schiesser on AM Please respond to To Karen Owens cc Subject FW thank you Karen I received a bounce back from If you dont mind would you please forward this on to Greg Thanks Heath Heath Schiesser Original Message From Heath Schiesser mailto Sent Wednesday May PM To Subject thank you Greg Thank you for taking the time to speak with me this evening about the Xcelerator I enjoyed our conversation and particularly appreciated your candor It sounds like the Xcelerator structured carefully could be an exciting place to be Please feel free to contact me if you would like to discuss this further Thanks again Heath Heath Schiesser
